title: Allow Clubs and BOC users to create a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction from Player History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club or BOC user wants to create a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction from Player History
AND user has navigated to a player's Player History Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Create New" button on Player's Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should be an option in the top-level dropdown
AND clicking "Transactions" option should cause "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons to be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit the third and fourth levels to only Major items
AND "Disabled List" should appear as an option under Major Transactions
AND "Place on 7 day Concussion DL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown

title: Earliest Reinstatement Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants the Earliest Reinstatement date calculated correctly on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user enters or changes the Placement Date on a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_expected: THEN the system will calculate and display Earliest Reinstatement Date as the 8th day after the Placement Date (including the Placement Date)

title: Allow Club user to submit a place on 7-Day Concussion DL to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to submit a place on 7-Day Concussion DL to the BOC for approval
AND the form is in a preliminary or rejected status
AND the blue Submit button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN the system should run a required field and format check according to the data discovery
AND the system should run the On Submit rules check
AND once the rules have passed, the system should update the status of the transaction to "Submitted to BOC"
AND the system should reload the transaction in view mode, and display a successful submit blue notification
AND the system should create an entry in green font in the player's Player History [Code = DL07J, Description = Place on 7-day Concussion DL]
AND player's major league roster status should change to "7-Day Concussion DL"

title: Allow BOC user to reject a place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction has been submitted to BOC
AND grey "Reject" button is available (in view or edit mode)
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user clicks "Reject"
AND all On Save rules have passed or been overridden
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status is updated to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification #78 is displayed
AND item is removed from the approvals clipboard
AND player's pending Major League Roster status is reversed
AND pending player history entry is removed

title: Allow BOC user to approve a place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction has been submitted to the BOC
AND transaction is in  Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected status
AND blue "Approve" button is available
custom_steps:
WHEN the BOC user clicks "Approve"
AND all rules have passed or been overridden
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status is updated to "Approved"
AND item is reloaded in view mode if it was in edit mode
AND a successful blue notification (#80) is displayed that states the transaction was approved
AND item is removed from the approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History is updated: Code = DL07J Description = Place on 7-day Concussion DL, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields should be in black font
AND player's Major League Roster status is set to 7-Day Concussion DL

title: Allow BOC user to reverse a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction has been submitted and approved for a player
AND BOC user sees a "Reverse" button in grey on the transaction
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user clicks "Reverse"
AND all required field and formatting checks are passed
custom_expected:
THEN successful reverse notification (#79) should be displayed
AND transaction status should be updated to "Reversed"
AND reversed transaction is displayed in Player History with "Voided": in front of transaction description (EX:"Voided: Selection to ML Roster‚Äù)
AND any action item generated for Club user is removed

title: Allow user to delete a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to delete a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
AND user has edit permissions
AND transaction is in Preliminary or Rejected sate
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the grey Delete button in view or edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt user with " Are you sure you want to delete this [form]?"
AND clicking yes will delete and close the form and return user to entry point
AND clicking no will return the user to the form and take no action

title: As a user I want to receive an error if I'm attempting to place a player on the DL out of season
custom_steps:
Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired) will check if the entered placement date falls between the start of spring training and the submitting Org's Last day of season date (including the post season). If not, then an error will be shown.
Message
Body: "The player must be placed between the open and closing date of the season, from {0} to {1}."
{0} should be replaced with the start of Spring Training system date.
{1} should be replaced with the player's Club's Last Day of Season system date.
Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: Error message when attempting to place a player who is at the MN level
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to place a player on the 7-Day Concussion DL 
AND selected player's pending roster status is at the minor league level
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Place on 7-Day Concussion DL" from the "Create New" menu
custom_expected:
THEN user will receive error "This transaction is for Major League players only."
AND clicking "Back" button will close the modal and return user to the point of entry

title: 7-Day Concussion DL Transaction Club Admin Permissons
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club admin (ex:club-nyy-mjc-admin)
AND user's club is the "From Org" or "To Org"
AND transaction is not in Suppressed state
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_expected:
THEN user can create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, view comments and e-sign transaction
AND BOC notes should not be visible

title: 7-Day Concussion DL Transaction Club Basic Permissions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club basic user
AND user's club is the "From Org" on the transaction
AND transaction is not in Suppressed state
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction opens in view mode
AND BOC notes should not be visible

title: 7-Day Concussion DL Transaction BOC Basic Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC basic user
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens any Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_expected: THEN user has view and print permissions but cannot Create New or make any changes or e-sign

title: 7-Day Concussion DL Transaction BOC Admin Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC admin (ex:club-lrd-mjc-admin)
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_expected: THEN user has view and edit permissions including create, delete, and approve

title: User wants to create a new 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND no preliminary, submitted, or rejected 60 Day DL transaction exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Place on 60-Day DL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Place on 60-Day DL" will cause the system to load a new preliminary transaction in edit mode
AND all fields should match data discovery

title: Save a 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club or BOC user has a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction open in edit mode
AND a "Save" button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction and its current values should be saved
AND system should display a successful save blue notification
AND the transaction should be reloaded in view mode

title: Submit a 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
AND transaction is in preliminary or rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Submit to BOC" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run required field and format check
AND any errors should cause the system to generate an error message
AND once all rules pass the system should update transaction status to "Submitted to BOC"
AND an entry should be created in green font in players' Player Historyy: Code = DL60J, Description = Place on 60-day DL
AND player's pending major league roster status should be updated to "60-Day DL"

title: BOC user receive an approval item when 60 Day DL tx is submitted
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club is attempting to submit a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction to BOC for approval
custom_steps: WHEN transaction reaches a status of "Submitted to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN an approval item should be generated and display on BOC- Major Transactions - Admin's Approvals widget
AND any attached files should be displayed and available for download from attachments column of approvals widget
AND any comments should display in the comments column of approvals widget
AND any flags should display in the flags column of the approvals widget
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink will open Player Profile to Player History Tab in the same window/tab
AND clicking Type hyperlink will open submitted transaction in view mode in the same window/tab

title: Reject a 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a club has submitted a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction to BOC for approval
AND BOC user sees "Reject" button on the transaction in view or edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reject"
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display any relevant error or warning messages
AND once all rules have passed system should update transaction status to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification (message #78) should be displayed
AND item should be removed from Approvals Clipboard
AND player's pending Major League Roster status should be reversed
AND pending Player History entry should be removed
AND any action items regarding the transaction should be removed

title: Club user receives notification when tx is approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction exists for a player
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the transaction or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN 60 Day DL transaction reaches an "Approved" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: Club user receives notification when tx is reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction exists for a player
AND transaction is not suppressed
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the transaction or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN 60 Day DL transaction reaches an "Reversed" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: Club user receives notification when tx is rejected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction exists for a player
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the transaction or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN 60 Day DL transaction reaches an "Rejected" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: Cancel creation of or changes to 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is editing a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
AND grey "Cancel" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Cancel" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt user to confirm they wish to cancel the changes made
AND confirming cancellation should close form and keep no record, and return user to point of entry
AND not confirming cancellation should return user to form and take no action

title: Receive error if required fields are missing or violations of on save rules are broken
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is attempting to save a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
AND required fields are missing or on save rules have been broken (according to data discovery)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should check all rules detailed in data discovery
AND system should display proper error for any rules that have been violated

title: Cancel creation of or changes to 60 Day DL tx - previously saved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is editing a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
AND grey "Cancel" button is displayed on the form
AND form has been saved by user previously
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Cancel" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt user to confirm they wish to cancel the changes made
AND confirming cancellation should reload form in default mode for the transaction state with none of the edits made since last save reflected
AND not confirming cancellation should return user to form and take no action

title: As a user I want to receive an error if the I'm attempting to place a player on the DL out of season
custom_steps:
Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired) will check if the entered placement date falls between the start of spring training and the submitting Org's Last day of season date (including the post season). If not, then an error will be shown.
Message
Body: "The player must be placed between the open and closing date of the season, from {0} to {1}."
{0} should be replaced with the start of Spring Training system date.
{1} should be replaced with the player's Club's Last Day of Season system date.
Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: Club user is preventing from creating a tx for a player NOT belonging to their club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN is logged in as a club user and is attempting to create a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
AND player's Current Org is different from logged in club user's Org
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Place on 60 Day DL" on the Create New menu in Player History
custom_expected:
THEN system should display a blocking message "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization."
AND clicking "Back" will return the user to the entry point

title: As a user I want to receive an error if the player I'm attempting to place on the MJ 60-Day DL is at the MN level
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria:

Selecting "Place on 60-Day DL" from the Major League Create New menu will check that the player's Pending Roster Status is not at the minor league level.
If the player's pending roster status is at the minor league level, then the user will receive an error.
If the player does not have a pending roster status, then the current roster status is used.
This rule is also checked on Submit and Approve.
Message
Title: "Error"
Body: "This transaction is for Major League players only."
Button(s): Back
Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the point of entry.

title: Receive an error if the last game date is in the future on tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
AND Last Game Date entered on the transaction occurs in the future
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "Last Game Date must not be a future date."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive an error if exam date is in the future on tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
AND Exam Date entered on the transaction occurs in the future
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "Exam Date must not be a future date."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive an error if injury date is in the future on tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
AND Injury Date entered on the transaction occurs in the future
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "Injury Date must not be a future date."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: As a user I want to receive a warning if I'm placing a player on the 60-Day DL and my reserve list has fewer than 40 players
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria:

Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired) will check if the Org that the player belongs to has 40 or more players on its Reserve List, including the player being placed on the disabled list. If the Org has fewer than 40 players, then a warning will be shown.
Message
Body: "A Major League player cannot be placed on 60-day list unless the player's Major League Club's reserve list contains at least 40 players. Currently it contains {0} players."
{0} should be replaced with the current count of the Org's Reserve List.
Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
Clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: As a user I want to receive an error if the player I'm attempting to place on the 60-Day DL is at the MN level
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria:

Clicking Submit or Approve on a "Place on 60-Day DL" transaction will check that the player's Pending Roster Status is not at the minor league level.
If the player's pending roster status is at the minor league level, then the user will receive an error.
If the player does not have a pending roster status, then the current roster status is used.
Message
Title: "Error"
Body: "This transaction is for Major League players only."
Button(s): Back
Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the point of entry.

title: As a user I want to receive an error if the placement date entered on a DL transaction is after the Roster Affected Date
custom_steps:
Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired) will check if the placement date entered on the transaction does is on or before the Roster Affected Date entered on the transaction. If not, then an error will be shown.
Message
Body: "DL Placement Date must be on or before Roster Affected date."
Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: As a user I want to receive a warning if the exam date entered on my 60-Day DL is more than 10 days ago
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria:

Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired) will check if the Exam Date entered on the transaction is more than 10 days ago (can be equal to 10 days ago). If yes, then a warning will be shown.
Message
Body: "Exam Date entered is more than 10 days ago. Please enter the most recent exam date for the player."
Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
Clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: As a user I want to receive an error if the player I'm creating a place on 60-Day DL transaction for does not have a valid MJ roster status
custom_steps:
Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired) will check if the player‚Äôs pending (or current if pending is not populated) major league roster status is Active or Active Pending Contract. If no, then an error will be shown.
Message
Body: "Player must be Active, or Active Pending Contract to be placed on the DL."
Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.

title: As a user I want to receive an error if the player I am creating a place on 60-day DL for has a pending or approved transaction after the entered assignment date
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria:

Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" will check if the Placement date is before the latest approved or pending (Pending to Club, Submitted to BOC) transaction date for the player. If it is, an error will display.
Message
Body: "A transaction cannot occur before the date of <Roster Name Last Name>'s latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."
Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: BOC receives error approving a tx without entered comments to explain change in injury details
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on 60 Day Concussion DL" transaction has been submitted to BOC
AND BOC has made changes to the Injury Details on the transaction after it was submitted 
AND BOC has not entered anything into the "Comments"
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user attempts to click "Approve" on the item
custom_expected:
THEN user will see error message "You must enter comments if updating Injury Details."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction

title: BOC admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC - Admin user
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to view, edit, or create a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
custom_expected:

AND user should be able to create, delete, edit, e-sign and submit all Major league transactions for Major League players
AND user should be able to Approve, Reject, Reverse and Suppress all Major League transactions and see associated Flags

title: BOC basic

custom_expected:

BUT user should not be able to make any changes or e-sign.

title: Club admin - All transactions including other clubs and BOC only

custom_expected:

BUT user should not be able to see BOC Notes field for any transaction
AND user should not be able to see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
AND user should not be able to see attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

title: As a user I want to see what Recertifications are due for a player on my Recertifications tab - 10 Day DL
custom_preconds: disabled list, mj - place on 10 day dl, recertification widget, ux-approval-na
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
http://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=recertification

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The "Recertification Due" column will be populated with Recertifications that have or should have occurred, in a comma separated list (see wire). 
* For a 7-Day Concussion DL placement, the first Recertification Due Date will be 7 days after the placement date. The following will be 7 days after the first recertification due date and so forth. 
* For a 10-Day DL placement, the first Recertification Due Date will be 10 days after the placement date. The following will be 10 days after the first recertification due date and so forth. 
* For a 60-Day DL placement, there are no recertifications due so the column will remain blank. 
* Each 7 and 10 Day row will always show any Recertification Due dates that have passed, and the one that is next due that is in the future. (Ex: If there is a recertification due for a player on the 10 Day DL that is Due on May 1st, the form will display May 1st, as well as a May 11th Recertification due date, but will NOT display a May 21st Recertification due date until it is past May 11th.)

title: User wants reinstating a player from the DL to update their information on the Recertifications tab

AND a player has been reinstated from the DL
custom_steps: WHEN user views the "Recertifications" tab
custom_expected:
THEN "Reinstatement Date" column should only be populated once the player has been Reinstated from the DL
AND "Reinstatement Date" column should have the Reinstatement Date entered on their Reinstatement for this DL placement
AND the "Recertification Due" column should be populated with Recertifications that have or should have occurred, in a comma separated list
AND if the Reinstatement Date is on or before any of the Recertification Due dates listed - these dates should be removed from the form

title: As a user I want to receive an email when a player requires a DL Recertification
custom_preconds: cba change, disabled list, email, mj - place on 10 day dl, mj - recertify a player
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
*Note nothing is changing for this story from previously - just ensuring that this functionality still works with the change from a 15-Day DL to a 10-Day DL*

* The system should check nightly to see if any new players require a DL recertification. 
* If not, no action is taken. 
* If yes, then the system checks to see if "Send Emails" is set to Yes. 
* If yes, then the system checks to see if "Send Notification" is checked for Clubs for the "DL E-recerts" under the Transactions section of the Email Utility. 
* If yes, then an email notification is generated for the player's Org.
* The system also checks to see if "Send Notification" is checked for the BOC for the "DL E-recerts" under the Transactions section of the Email Utility. 
* If yes, then an email notification is generated for the BOC.
* The email should show the dates for all recerts that are still due for the player, separated by commas
* The email should follow the below example.

Example: 
From: e-bulletinsdev@mlb.com [mailto:e-bulletinsdev@mlb.com] 
Sent: Monday, September 26, 2016 12:52 PM
To: youremail@yourdomain.com
Subject: DL E-Recert

Matthew Holliday DL Recertification due 08/27/2016

title: User wants to add new Authorized Signatory from a Place on 7-Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with edit capabilities for the Authorized Signatory Widget
AND user is viewing a Place on 7-Day DL tx in edit mode 
AND authorized signatory field contains a list of the Authorized Signatories with MJ Transactions checked off in the Auth Signatories widget, that belong to the Org displayed on the transaction
AND "New" link appears above the Authorized signatory field
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "New" link
custom_expected:
THEN a modal should be launched that allows user to enter a new Authorized Signatory for the player's Org
AND the checkbox associated with the form the user is adding a new signatory from should be auto checked and disabled.
AND the Save button should be disabled until all required fields have been populated.
AND clicking "Save" should add the authorized signatory to the system and close the modal, with the "Authorized Signatory" field pre-populated with the newly added Authorized Signatory
AND the Authorized SIgnatory should be added to the authorized signatory widget and should appear for the Org for all users that have permission to view that Org's Authorized Signatories
AND clicking Cancel should cancel the addition of the authorized signatory, and return the user to the form

title: Earliest Reinstatement Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants the Earliest Reinstatement date calculated correctly on 7-Day DL transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user enters or changes the Placement Date on a Place on 7-Day DL transaction
custom_expected: THEN the system will calculate and display Earliest Reinstatement Date as the 8th day after the Placement Date (including the Placement Date)

title: Allow BOC user to receive Approval Item when a Place on 7-Day DL is submitted
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Place on 7-Day DL tx exists for a player
custom_steps: WHEN transaction reaches a status of "Submitted to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN an approval item should be generated and display on the BOC - MN Transactions- Admin's Approvals widget
AND any attached files should be displayed and available for download from the Attachments column of the Approvals widget
AND any comments on the transaction should be displayed in the Comments column of the Approvals widget
AND any flags on the transaction should be displayed in the Flags column of the Approvals widget
AND player name should be a hyperlink in the Approvals widget
AND clicking on the player name will open the Player Profile (defaults to Player History tab) in the same window/tab
AND "Type" should be a hyperlink
AND clicking on the type hyperlink of a submitted transaction should open the submitted transaction in view mode in the same window/tab.

title: Club user receives notification when Place on 7-Day DL tx is approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on 7 Day DL" transaction exists for a player
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the transaction or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN 7 Day DL transaction reaches an "Approved" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Place on 7 Day DL" transaction in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: Error message if Placement Date precedes last game date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve completed 7-Day DL transaction
AND entered Placement Date is on or before "Last Game Date" 
AND doubleheader option is not checked
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN user will see error message "The player cannot be placed on the DL before his Last Game Appearance of..."
AND clicking Back button will return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Error message if attempting to place player on DL out of season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve completed 7-Day DL transaction
AND entered Placement Date falls outside the season dates for the player's MN league club season dates (First Game of Season through Last Game of Season (or Last playoff date if that's later) on Club System Dates screen)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve (all places OnSubmit rules are fired)
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "The player must be placed between the open and closing date of the season, from {Start of Spring training system date} to {Club's last day of season system date}."
AND clicking Back should close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC Only)

title: Error message if Last Game Date is in the future
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed 7-Day DL transaction
AND Last Game Date entered on the transaction occurs in the future
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "Last Game Date must not be a future date."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Error message if Date of Injury is prior to subsequent assignment from Major Leagues
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a Place on 7-Day DL transaction 
AND player has an approved Major/Minor Outright, Optional Assignment, or accepted Return of Rule 5 Selection transaction with transaction date after the Date of Injury and before the Placement Date.
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Date of injury is prior to subsequent assignment(s) from the Major Leagues."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: User wants to receive error when placing player who has Claimed waivers on MN 60 Day DL before Withdrawal Expiration
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is a claimed TRD waiver Request for a player
AND no WCA has been submitted for the player
AND user is attempting to submit/approve a Place on MN 60 Day DL tx for this player 
AND injury date is either before waiver request date OR between waiver request date and Withdrawal Period Expiration date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks submit/approve
custom_expected:
THEN system should throw warning ‚ÄúPlayer has claimed TRD waiver request that will be cancelled as a result of this placement.‚Äù 
AND if user overrides the warning the player's waivers will be cancelled on approve of the DL placement

custom_expected:

AND club user should be able to edit Last Game Date field 
AND club user should receive a required fields error if they try to save/submit with this field blank

title: As a Club user I want to receive a hard error if no last game date is entered for a minor league DL placement
custom_preconds:

custom_steps: WHEN user opens new tx
custom_expected:

AND user should receive required field error on submit if it's left blank
AND this should be a hard error for clubs
BUT this should be an overrideable warning for BOC

title: As a user I want to receive an error if the player I'm attempting to place on the 60-Day DL has a submitted waiver request
custom_preconds:
See Business Rule #1.01: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2308669
See Error Message #1: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2309676
See Wireframe: 
(Global form error & warning handling) 
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=errors___warnings
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=warnings
GIVEN a player has a submitted waiver request (Request submitted, Request Bulletin not sent)
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to submit or approve a Place on 60 DL(MN) tx for him
custom_expected:
THEN system should display the following error:
 "Player with a submitted waiver request may not be assigned.  The waiver request should be deleted before re-submitting the assignment."
AND Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: As a user I want to receive a warning if the player I'm attempting to place on the 60-Day DL has any pending waiver requests

http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=errors___warnings
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=warnings
GIVEN a player has a pending waiver request (Request bulletin sent, Result Bulletin NOT yet sent)
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to submit or approve a Place on 60 Day DL(MN) tx for him
custom_expected:

"Player has pending {0} waiver request(s) that will be cancelled as a result of this placement."
* {0} to be replaced with the waiver type.
AND Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: As a user I want to receive a warning if the player I'm attempting to place on the 60-Day DL has previously secured waivers

https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2309676

(Global form error & warning handling) 
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=errors___warnings
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=warnings

custom_steps:
WHEN user attempts to submit or approve a place on 60 Day DL(MN) tx for him
AND Injury date on the DL tx is Either:
-Before Waiver Request Date(On waiver bulletin screen)
OR
-Between Request Date and Claim Period Expiration Date(On waiver bulletin screen)
custom_expected:

 "Previously secured {0} waivers for this player will be cancelled as a result of this placement."

AND Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: User wants to create a new Reinstate from DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND no preliminary, submitted, or rejected Reinstate from DL transaction exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Reinstate from DL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND clicking "Reinstate from DL" should load a new Preliminary transaction in edit mode

title: BOC user approves Reinstate from DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a club has submitted a "Reinstate from DL" transaction to BOC for approval
AND transaction is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected state
AND BOC user sees "Approve" button in blue on the transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Approve" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field, formatting, on Submit, and on Approve rules checks
AND once all rules have passed or been overridden transaction status is updated to "Approved"
AND if item was in edit mode it is reloaded in view mode
AND successful save blue notification is displayed (message #80)
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History should be updated: Code = REINS Description = Reinstate From {Disabled List}, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font
AND player's MJ roster status should be set to Active

title: BOC user rejects Reinstate from DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a club has submitted a "Reinstate from DL" transaction to BOC for approval
AND BOC user sees "Reject" button on the transaction in view or edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reject"
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display any relevant error or warning messages
AND once all rules have passed system should update transaction status to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification (message #78) should be displayed
AND item should be removed from Approvals Clipboard
AND player's pending Major League Roster status should be reversed
AND pending Player History entry should be removed
AND any action items regarding the transaction should be removed

title: Reverse a Reinstate from DL tx

custom_expected:

AND successful reverse notification should display (message #79)
AND transaction status should update to "Reversed"
AND reversed transaction should display in Player History with "Voided" in front of the transaction
AND any action items generated as a result of the transaction should be removed

title: Club user prevented from creating a tx for a player that does NOT belong to same org
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is attempting to initiate a "Reinstate from DL" transaction for a player
AND selected player's Current Org is not the same Org as the initiating user
custom_steps: WHEN initiating club user selects "Reinstate from DL" on the Create New menu from player's Player History
custom_expected:
THEN system should display blocking message "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization."
AND clicking "Back" button will return user to the entry point

title: Receive error if placement date is back dated more than 5 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Reinstate from DL" transaction 
AND Placement Date on transaction is 5 or more days prior to the current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Placement Date must be within 5 days of submission."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive error if placement date is future dated more than 5 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Reinstate from DL" transaction 
AND Placement Date on transaction is 5 or more days after the current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Placement Date must be within 5 days of submission."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive error if user is submitting a tx without "Received Return to Play Form" checkbox being checked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Reinstatement from DL" transaction 
AND "Received Return to Play Form" checkbox is present on the form
BUT "Received Return to Play Form" checkbox is not checked
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "A player must have received Approval to Return to Play to be reinstated from placement on the DL due to concussion."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive error if player has a pending or approved tx after the entered assignment date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Reinstate from DL" transaction 
AND Placement Date on the transaction is before the latest approved or pending (Pending to Club, Submitted to BOC) transaction date for the player
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "A transaction cannot occur before the date of the player's latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive error if entered reinstatement date is before the Earliest Reinstatement Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to initiate a "Reinstate from DL" transaction for a player
AND reinstatement date entered on the form is before the Earliest Reinstatement Date displayed on the transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error message "The player cannot be reinstated before the earliest reinstatement date."
AND clicking "Back" button will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC Only)

title: BOC user receives error if tx placement date is after the current date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to approve a "Reinstate from DL" transaction for a player
AND Reinstatement Date on the transaction is after current date
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error "This transaction cannot be approved unless the transaction date is on or before the current date."
AND clicking "Back" will close the modal and return user to the transaction

title: BOC user receives error if attempting to approve DL tx for a player that has a pending tx with an earlier date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Reinstate from DL tx has been submitted for a player
AND selected player has a pending tx with a transaction date earlier than the Placement Date on the form
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "This transaction cannot be approved until the player's other pending transactions with earlier dates have been approved."
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction

title: Receive error if player has a pending or approved tx after the entered assignment date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Reinstate from DL" transaction 
AND Placement Date on the transaction is before the latest approved or pending (Pending to Club, Submitted to BOC) transaction date for the player
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "A transaction cannot occur before the date of the player's latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive error if entered reinstatement date is before the Earliest Reinstatement Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to initiate a "Reinstate from DL" transaction for a player
AND reinstatement date entered on the form is before the Earliest Reinstatement Date displayed on the transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error message "The player cannot be reinstated before the earliest reinstatement date."
AND clicking "Back" button will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC Only)

title: BOC admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC - Admin user
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to view, edit, or create a "Reinstate from DL" transaction for a player
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and Print all major league transactions [Club and BOC] in all states for Major League Players
AND user should be able to view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states
AND user should be able to create, delete, edit, e-sign and submit all Major league transactions for Major League players
AND user should be able to Approve, Reject, Reverse and Suppress all Major League transactions and see associated Flags

title: BOC basic
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC - Basic user
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to view, edit, or create a "Reinstate from DL" transaction for a player
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and Print all major league transactions [Club and BOC] in all states for Major League Players
AND user should be able to view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states.
BUT user should not be able to make any changes or e-sign.

title: Club admin - User's Club is "From Org" or "To Org"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Club-Admin Permissions
AND user is listed as "From Org" or "To Org" on "Reinstate from DL" transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club-Admin user
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and print all major league transactions in all states when the logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that transaction 
AND user should be able to create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Major League transactions for Major League players on their Org's roster
BUT user should not be able to view transactions in "Suppressed" state
AND user should not be able to view "BOC Notes" field

title: Club basic - All transactions including other clubs and BOC only
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has Club basic permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club-Basic user
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only
BUT user should not be able to see BOC Notes field for any transaction
AND user should not be able to see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
AND user should not be able to see attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

title: User should be prevented from creating or viewing a tx if they do not have permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in that does not have view permissions for a "Reinstate from DL" transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view or edit a "Reinstate from DL" transaction
custom_expected: THEN user should not be able to view or edit transaction

title: Club basic - User's Club is "From Org'' or "To Org"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Club-Basic Permission
AND user is listed as "From Org" or "To Org" on "Reinstate from DL" transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club-Basic user
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and print all major league transactions in all states when the logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that transaction 
BUT user should not be able to view transactions in "Suppressed" state
AND user should not be able to edit or change these transactions
AND user should not be able to view "BOC Notes" field

title: Club admin - All transactions including other clubs and BOC only
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has Club admin permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club admin
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only
AND user should be able to create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Major League transactions for Major League players on their Org's roster or if they are the"From Org" or "To Org"
BUT user should not be able to see BOC Notes field for any transaction
AND user should not be able to see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
AND user should not be able to see attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

title: User wants Last Rehab Date calculated correctly on Rehab Assignment
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is attempting to create a "Place on Rehab Assignment" tx for a player
custom_steps: WHEN "Place on Rehab Assignment" tx is loaded, saved, or goes through any state change
custom_expected:
THEN system should correctly calculate Last Rehab Date for the tx
AND Last Rehab Date should be calculated as Assignment Date + Number of Days for Rehab. (Ex: Assignment Date 4/14/16 and # of days = 30, then the Last Rehab Date is 5/13/2016)

title: BOC user wants to add an Extension to Approved Rehab Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user is viewing an existing "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx for a player
AND tx is in "Approved" state
AND no extensions currently exist on the form
AND "Add Extension" button is visible
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Add Extension"
custom_expected:
THEN Extension section should be added to the form
AND Extension section should match data discovery and wireframe
AND user should be able to complete Extension section and click "Save" on the tx
AND clicking "Save" should run all on Save rule checks and required field and formatting checks
AND successful save blue notification should display

title: BOC user wants to remove an Extension from an Approved Rehab Assignment tx - only one extension
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and viewing a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx for a player in edit mode
AND tx is in "Approved" state 
AND tx has only one Extension added
AND the Extension has never been saved
AND a trash can is available on the entire section
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the trash can
custom_expected:
THEN the entire Extension section should be removed from the form
AND "Add Extension" button at the bottom of the form should become available again

title: BOC user wants to receive an error if adding an extension to Rehab Assignment for player that is no longer on Rehab Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user has an existing, Approved "Place on Rehab Assignment" tx open for a player in edit mode
AND user has added a new Extension to the tx
BUT the selected player has already been returned from rehab assignment
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "A player must currently be on rehab assignment in order to add an extension. The player was returned from this Rehab Assignment on {0}. " ({0} should be replaced with the Return from Rehab date from the Return associated with this rehab placement)
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return user to the transaction

title: User wants saving an Approved Rehab Assignment to check if valid number of extension days are entered on tx if it's a Continuation of Rehab - Pitcher
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged
AND user is viewing an Approved "Rehab Assignment" tx for a pitcher
AND user has added one or more extension days to the tx 
AND value entered for # Days for Rehab + all entered Extension Days are greater than or equal 30
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" on the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "A pitcher is only allowed a total of 30 days of rehab. Current total: {0}."
AND "{0}" should reflect total # days entered on this form
AND Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the tx (BOC Only)

title: Club user receives notification when Rehab Assignment tx is approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Rehab Assignment" transaction exists for a player
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the transaction or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN Rehab Assignment transaction reaches an "Approved" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Rehab Assignment" transaction in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: Club user receives notification when Rehab Assignment tx is rejected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Rehab Assignment" transaction exists for a player
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the transaction or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN Rehab Assignment transaction reaches an "Rejected" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Rehab Assignment" transaction in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: Club user receives notification when Rehab Assignment tx is reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Rehab Assignment" transaction exists for a player
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the transaction or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps:
WHEN Rehab Assignment transaction reaches an "Reversed" state
BUT the transaction is not also Suppressed
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Rehab Assignment" transaction in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: User wants Number of Days of Rehab to populate correctly on Place on Rehab Assignment
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants Number of Days of Rehab to populate correctly on Place on Rehab Assignment tx
custom_steps: WHEN user creates a new Place on Rehab Assignment tx
custom_expected:
THEN Number of Days of Rehab should be 30 if the player is a pitcher
AND Number of Days of Rehab should be 20 if the player is a position player
AND the field should not be editable for club users even if they have edit permissions
BUT BOC users with edit permissions should be able to enter other values besides 30 and 20

title: User receives error if submitting a rehab assignment tx with a number of days that exceeds the set limits - Pitcher
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx open for a Pitcher at MN level
AND value entered on "Place on Rehab Assignment" tx for Number of Days for Rehab is greater than 30
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "A pitcher is only allowed a total of 30 days of rehab. Current total: {0}."({0} reflects the number of days entered on this form
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC Only)

title: User receives error if submitting rehab assignment tx with a number of days that exceeds the set limits - Position Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx open for a Position Player at MJ level
AND value entered on tx for Number of Days for Rehab is greater than 20
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "A non-pitcher is only allowed 20 days of rehab. Current total: {0}."({0} reflects the number of days entered on this form
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC Only)

title: User receives error if submitting Rehab Assignment too close to player's injury date - Pitcher
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to "Submit" or "Approve" a "Place on Rehab Assignment" tx for a Pitcher at MN level
AND player's pending (on submit) or current (on Approve) MN Roster status is 7-Day DL or 60-Day DL
AND assignment date entered on tx is fewer than 5 days after the player's last Injury Date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "A pitcher may only be placed on rehab {5} days after Injury Date. Current value: {1}." ({1} reflects the number of days that have currently passed since the player's last Injury Date up to the entered Assignment Date)
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC only)

title: User receives error if submitting Rehab Assignment too close to player's injury date - Position Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to "Submit" or "Approve" a "Place on Rehab Assignment" tx for a Position Player at MN level
AND player's pending (on Submit) or current (on Approve) MN Roster status is 7-Day DL or 60-Day DL
AND assignment date entered on tx is fewer than 3 days after the player's last Injury Date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "A non-pitcher may only be placed on rehab {3} days after Injury Date. Current value: {1}." ({1} reflects the number of days that have currently passed since the player's last Injury Date up to the entered Assignment Date)
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC only)

title: Receive error if Rehab Club's level of play is not SA, R, or RA
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to Submit or Approve a Rehab Assignment tx for a player
AND Rehab Club that the player is being assigned to is not SA, R, or RA
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks submit or approve
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "Rehab level must be either R, RA, or short A"
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction 
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the transaction(BOC only)
